value:
The royals of this realm seem to
employ no retainers. I find that...
interesting.$k$pBoth Hoshido and Nohr use them
to safeguard royals. Are they that
able to defend themselves here?

My liege is Lord Ryoma, a noble
leader, strong in spirit and body.
It is my honor to serve him.

You are so dutiful. I would be glad
to prepare a tea ceremony for you.
You'll find it relaxing.$k$pI prefer to use green tea, though
mine tends to be bitter. It goes
with sweet treats nicely, however.

You're also new here. You'll want to
remember everything from these
days when all seems unusual.$k$pI find that keeping a diary helps one
preserve memories—especially if
you draw pictures too.

I draw pictures of the local scenery in
my diary. I'm afraid that they look a
bit hellish. It's...just how I draw.

I've come on a mission from
$Nf.$k$pBasically, it's to say hello. That done,
I'll be on my way.

A ninja shows no emotion. Not
even joy.
Good enough.
Less than I'd like...

I'll make greater gains with this
power. I thank you.

I am Kagero, a ninja from Hoshido.
You have a mission for me? Then I
will serve you from the shadows.

I've been doing flower arrangements
from whatever I can find in this
world. Here's my latest creation.$k$pWhat do you think of it? Ah. It looks
like something from a hellscape?
Well, I appreciate your honesty.$k$pCurious to think how I'd have never
been able to work with these flowers
had I not come to this world.$k$pIn a way, you have played a large
part in the creation of this
flower arrangement.$k$pI can thank you for many things,
and most of all, that every one
of us remains safe.$k$pSo I vow to keep you safe, no matter
what dread events come to pass,
$Nu.
せいっ
はあっ
くっ…！
It doesn't hurt...
You have breathed your last.
You are already dead.
I'll finish this.
Absolute annihilation!
Defeated...
Hmm.
Have you known many ninja? We are a...unique breed.
I always carry out my mission. No matter how grave the stakes.
I value activities that require quiet and focus. Flower arranging. Tea ceremonies.
My paintings, my flower arrangements... I'm afraid they're not to everyone's taste.
A ninja should remain in shadow. Until she is summoned.
Where is Lord Ryoma? I have a duty to protect him!
I am often nowhere to be seen in times of war. That's when I'm doing my...best work.
Hmm?
Say the word.
Let's go.
